text:
@megynkelly Trump last week: Coronavirus cases “going very substantially down”
Fauci today: “The bottom line it’s going to get worse.”
Trump: vaccine in “months”
Fauci: vaccine in “a year to year & a half”
Trump: death rate “way under 1%”
Fauci: death rate 1%, 10x “more lethal” than flu
